ComicInfo.Title: Some Say Spidey Will Die by Fire... ...Some Say by Ice!
ComicInfo.Summary: Some Say Spidey Will Die by Fire... ...Some Say by Ice!: Equinox returns, trying to kill Spider-Man, but appears to kill Yellowjacket instead.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:43:34. [Issue ID 31236]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Yellowjacket [Hank Pym],Margay Sorenson (first appearance, Terry's mother),Equinox [Terry Sorenson] (villain),Iceman [Bobby Drake] (flashback),Wasp [Janet Van Dyne],Human Torch [Johnny Storm] (flashback)
ComicInfo.Letterer: Bruce Patterson,Dan Crespi,Gaspar Saladino,Gaspar Saladino,Bruce Patterson
ComicInfo.Tags: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Terry's mother),Yellowjacket [Hank Pym],Margay Sorenson (first appearance,Equinox [Terry Sorenson] (villain),Iceman [Bobby Drake] (flashback),Wasp [Janet Van Dyne],Human Torch [Johnny Storm] (flashback)
